discussion.content:
This exercise requires you to create a chart on opportunity where legend = status and axis = source campaign. 

Go to default solution --> Table --> Opportunity --> Chart --> Create new chart --> Name as required --> View = Closed Opportunity --> Chart Type = Stacked Bar --> Legend --> Status (Count All) --> Axis = Source Campaign --> Save --> Publish solution --> Save.
